alert.note: Alert for Harney County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:59PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Harney County through 345 PM PDT... At 258 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Bald Butte to near Walls Lake Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Burns, Hines, Weaver Lake and Wrights Point around 300 PM PDT. Baca Lake, Burnt Mountain, Idlewild Campground and Sand Hill around 310 PM PDT. Krumbo Lake, Crow Flat Guard Station, Buena Vista Field Station and King Mountain around 320 PM PDT. Narrows, Calamity Butte, Diamond and Diamond Craters around 330 PM PDT. New Princeton, Crane, Drewsey and Riddle Mountain around 340 PM PDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
